data.title: Adding Names & Nationalties
data.text:
Jack Basford medal 5007 CEO & CTO

6 years 43 days ago (Last edited by Yunus Unia Blunion 4 years 308 days ago)

If you'd like to be able to generate drivers for a nationality that doesn't currently allow it, or to expand the list of names for an existing nation, post a list of names here.

For any given nation, we need three comma-separated lists of names:

Male forenames

Female forenames

Family surnames

A comma-separated list does not contain spaces between the words. For example:

david,charles,william,tyler

Submissions that contain spaces won't work, such as the one below:

david, charles, william, tyler

Let us know which country the names are for and post them here, it's as simple as that.

----------------------------------

Here is a full list of nations that we currently have name databases for:

Albania, Argentina, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Brazil, Bulgaria, Canada, China, Colombia, Croatia, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Ghana, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, India, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Malaysia, Mexico, Morocco, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Russian Federation, Slovakia, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, United Kingdom, United States of America, Uruguay

Jack Basford medal 5007 CEO & CTO

6 years 43 days ago

Guys, please stick to the format described. They must be comma-delimited. Bruno's post above is the perfect example.

Sending a link is not really helpful, because I could end up picking a bunch of obscure names from a list. I would prefer if you have already filtered the names for quality and popularity and made them in to a list.

Gert Rose medal 5102 Super Mod

6 years 41 days ago
